languages.text: "Он покусился на мое. Когда чешуйчатый урод понял, что я остался без покровителя, он заявился со своей бандой и отобрал мое логово — это логово. А с ним — и мой портал на арену. А затем начал пастись на моих угодьях и забирать новичков, на которых претендовал я".

traits.locale_text: "Он покусился на мое. Когда чешуйчатый урод понял, что я остался без покровителя, он заявился со своей бандой и отобрал мое логово — это логово. А с ним — и мой портал на арену. А затем начал пастись на моих угодьях и забирать новичков, на которых претендовал я".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."
languages.original_text: "Он покусился на мое. Когда чешуйчатый урод понял, что я остался без покровителя, он заявился со своей бандой и отобрал мое логово — это логово. А с ним — и мой портал на арену. А затем начал пастись на моих угодьях и забирать новичков, на которых претендовал я".

And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “他抢走了原本属于我的东西。那个长着鳞片的怪物意识到我已经失去了靠山，于是他带着他的人闯进了我的巢穴，夺走了它，也夺走了属于我的竞技场传送门。在那之后，他就一直在我的牧场上放牧，掠夺本该属于我的新人。”
languages.original_text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."

traits.locale_text: “他抢走了原本属于我的东西。那个长着鳞片的怪物意识到我已经失去了靠山，于是他带着他的人闯进了我的巢穴，夺走了它，也夺走了属于我的竞技场传送门。在那之后，他就一直在我的牧场上放牧，掠夺本该属于我的新人。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「彼は私がこれまで得てきたものをすべて奪った。あの鱗に覆われた化け物は、私が後援者を失ったことに気づくと、すぐに仲間を引き連れてこの住処を襲い、強奪した。アリーナのポータルとともにね。他にも私が回収した物資を根こそぎ奪い、これから入ってくるはずだった物資までかっさらった」
languages.original_text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は私がこれまで得てきたものをすべて奪った。あの鱗に覆われた化け物は、私が後援者を失ったことに気づくと、すぐに仲間を引き連れてこの住処を襲い、強奪した。アリーナのポータルとともにね。他にも私が回収した物資を根こそぎ奪い、これから入ってくるはずだった物資までかっさらった」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Me arrebató lo que era mío. Cuando esa abominación escamosa descubrió que había perdido a mi patrón, llevó a su banda a mi guarida, donde ahora nos encontramos, y me la quitó. Y con ella, el portal del coliseo. Después siguió aprovechándose de lo que era mío y quedándose con los recién llegados en mi lugar».
languages.original_text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."

traits.locale_text: «Me arrebató lo que era mío. Cuando esa abominación escamosa descubrió que había perdido a mi patrón, llevó a su banda a mi guarida, donde ahora nos encontramos, y me la quitó. Y con ella, el portal del coliseo. Después siguió aprovechándose de lo que era mío y quedándose con los recién llegados en mi lugar».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."

languages.text: « Il a volé quelque chose qui m'appartenait. Quand ce monstre à écailles s'est rendu compte que je n'étais plus sous la protection de Tazarra, il a envoyé sa bande prendre le contrôle de mon repaire, et donc accessoirement du portail qui allait avec. Pire encore, il s'est mis à chasser sur mon territoire et à mettre le grappin sur les nouveaux arrivants qui devaient me revenir. »
languages.original_text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."

traits.locale_text: « Il a volé quelque chose qui m'appartenait. Quand ce monstre à écailles s'est rendu compte que je n'étais plus sous la protection de Tazarra, il a envoyé sa bande prendre le contrôle de mon repaire, et donc accessoirement du portail qui allait avec. Pire encore, il s'est mis à chasser sur mon territoire et à mettre le grappin sur les nouveaux arrivants qui devaient me revenir. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Er hat mir etwas gestohlen, das mir gehörte. Als dieser schuppige Freak erkannte, dass ich keine Gönnerin mehr hatte, brachte er seine Bande zu meinem Unterschlupf – diesem Unterschlupf – und raubte es mir. Zusammen mit meinem Arenaportal. Dann beackerte er mein Gebiet und fing Neuankömmlinge ab, die mir gehören sollten."
languages.original_text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat mir etwas gestohlen, das mir gehörte. Als dieser schuppige Freak erkannte, dass ich keine Gönnerin mehr hatte, brachte er seine Bande zu meinem Unterschlupf – diesem Unterschlupf – und raubte es mir. Zusammen mit meinem Arenaportal. Dann beackerte er mein Gebiet und fing Neuankömmlinge ab, die mir gehören sollten."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Benim olanı benden çaldı. Hamisiz kaldığımı gören o pullu ucube; çetesiyle beraber inime, buraya geldi ve onu benden aldı. Yanında arena portalımı da aldı. Sonra da sürülerimin otladığı yerlere gidip benim toplayacağım yeni kurbanlıklara çöktü."
languages.original_text: "He robbed me of what was mine. When that scaled freak realised I'd been left without a patron, he brought his gang to my den — this den — and took it away. And my arena portal with it. Then he went on grazing on my pastures and snatching new arrivals who were supposed to be mine."

traits.locale_text: "Benim olanı benden çaldı. Hamisiz kaldığımı gören o pullu ucube, çetesiyle beraber inime, bu ine geldi ve onu benden aldı. Yanında arena portalımı da aldı. Sonra da sürülerimin otladığı yerlere gidip, benim toplayacağım yeni kurbanlıkları topladı."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
